name: Vampire Dungeon
description:
Game Description

Vampire Dungeon  is a game about AI Behaviour featuring an AI opponent trying to find you while you on the other hand try to escape.

Key Features 

  • Player can throw objects to distract AI! But be careful not to be seen while you're doing it...
  • AI wanders through every area but be careful not to get seen or it might stay in that area for a while
Controls & Objective

WASD - Moving

Q/E - Lean

F - Unlock Door/Pick Up Key Items

R - Heartbeat

V - Flashlight

Left Click - Drag/Hold Objects (Doors, Cubes)

Right Click - Throw Held Item

Left Shift - Sprint

Left Control - Crouch

Spacebar - Jump

I - Inventory

Stand close to an object to see its current state. Red doors are locked, yellow ones are not. Yellow objects can be interacted with. Small spheres are keys.

You can hide in lockers and distract the AI with throwable objects. Be careful, it and its bats can hear you sprint. It also wont be fooled if it sees you throwing objects. 

Find the keys to the exit, before the AI catches you.

Both are also listed in the game in the pause menu!

Credits
  • Vincent Marvin Fehr (Code & Design)
